LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Club.description: A shaped heavy stick, for bashing enemies to death. The oldest weapon thats a part of human history in the very earliest times dating from the early prehistoric ages & the stone age. It's very primitive, but is effective for what it does.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ikwa.description: A short tribal spearhead dagger that is similar to the iklwa. It was designed to be driven into vital organs with a hard thrust that could kill or mortally wound an armored adversary in battle.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.description: One of the many of humanity's oldest tools & weapons. The knife has taken many forms & use, but the idea & concept has always remained the same. A handle for holding and a edge for cutting.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Spear.description: One of the oldest weapons used in ancient times, the simple neolithic polearm that's tipped with a sharp point historically used for hunting.\n\nIt was also mainly used for stabbing against armored opponents in melee combat.
